name: 張正春
objective: This course is to introduce basic theorems and concepts of optimization methods, and their engineering applications. The course will cover subjects such as:  (1) vector spaces and matrices, (2) optimization concepts from geometry, (3) one-dimensional search method, (4) gradient methods, (5) Newton’s method, (6) conjugate methods, (7) least-square analysis, (8) linear programming, and (9) Engineering applications.
